hints.content:
$\blue5\pink2$ has $\blue5$ tens and $\pink2$ ones.

$\blue{5}\pink{7}$ has $\blue5$ tens and $\pink7$ ones.

$\blue6\pink3$ has $\blue6$ tens and $\pink3$ ones.  

$\blue6\pink8$ has $\blue6$ tens and $\pink8$ ones.

The least number is $52$ because it has $5$ tens and $2$ ones.

The greatest number is $68$ because it has $6$ tens and $8$ ones.
Here are the numbers in order from least to greatest: $52$, $57$, $63$, $68$.
